case_studies.name: Key Life Network
case_studies.problem: A brand new startup needed a web presence to describe their business to potential clients and convert visitors into new leads.
case_studies.challenge: As a new business, the team had limited company work to show, requiring the site itself to stand in as a differentiator to hook potential clients and convince them to reach out.
